title: Banana Pudding Rice Krispies
excerpt: Creamy banana pudding blended with crispy Rice Krispies and marshmallow fluff for a sweet, no-bake treat.
steps: Prepare the banana pudding following package instructions and refrigerate until thickened and set.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Add marshmallows and stir until completely melted. Remove from heat.
Add vanilla extract, Rice Krispies cereal, crushed vanilla wafers, and banana pudding. Stir until well combined.
Press mixture into a greased 9x13-inch baking dish. Let cool and set.
Drizzle with melted white chocolate and additional crushed vanilla wafers before serving.
